#summary This page documents general information about the ICARUS Flyer.

= Introduction =

The ICARUS Flyer is a QuadTiltWing UAV.  Unlike a TiltRotor, a TiltWing operates by tilting an airfoil along with a motor/propeller help generate lift and thrust along a desired flight path.
